message: I think a 50/50 split is the fairest way to divide the money. What do you think?
Considering the inflation, I'll offer a bit more than before
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a little more than 4200 to make this worthwhile. How about a 45/55 split?
Getting closer, but I still think I deserve a bit more
I'm trying to be reasonable here, Alice.  I'm willing to go up to 4400, but I need to see some movement on your end. Let's find a solution that works for both of us.
I'll give you the same offer as before, it's a good deal considering the inflation
Alice, we're running out of time.  This inflation is really hurting my end of the deal.  I'm willing to go up to 4300, but that's my limit.  Let's make this happen!
